name: J-Breaker C
description:
Can't stop the cannon! Score high to unlock new characters!

You need 75% completion to pass a stage.

Switching characters affect active and special shot abilities, change the stage and may also change your maximum amount of shots per stage!

The following collectables may appear during each stage:

Extra shot - grants a bonus shot!

Special shot - collecting it while you have no shots left also grants a bonus shot!

Explosive bomb

Laser bomb
